ModMetaData.name: Ryuu's Electric Butcher Table
ModMetaData.author: Ryuu
ModMetaData.description:
This mod only contains an electric butcher table. The efficiency of an electric butcher table is 200% that of a butcher table. But like the electric production buildings in RimWorld, construction requires components and can breakdown.
Please feel free to speak up if you have any suggestions or comments.
source project link: https://github.com/Ryuu-64/Ryuu-RimWorld-ElectricButcherTable
Contributors: scott2521(76561198073525178): Fixed the electric butcher table description.
